meta_title: The Future of Predictive Maintenance: 2026 Prescriptive Guide
meta_description: In 2026, predictive maintenance has evolved into prescriptive action. See how sensor-agnostic platforms like Factory AI are eliminating 70% of unplanned
title: Beyond Prediction: Why the Future of Maintenance is Prescriptive, Agnostic, and Immediate

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Beyond Prediction: Why the Future of Maintenance is Prescriptive, Agnostic, and Immediate

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern manufacturing plant floor in 2026. The lighting is a mix of cool industrial blue and warm amber safety lighting. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers (men and women) wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and high-visibility vests are collaborating. One engineer is viewed from the back, holding a rugged tablet; the screen is not visible, but they are looking up at a large industrial motor. The background shows a mix of heavy machinery and clean automation lines. The atmosphere is professional, high-tech, and organized. No text or words should appear in the image.
